<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Monkey Pin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2985)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small brass pin is shaped like a monkey climbing a tree. When you activate this talisman, use a [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) action with a +1 item bonus on the check. On this check and until the end of your turn, if you succeed on an Athletics check to Climb, you move your full Speed during the Climb. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
